channel.title: CVE Feed for CodeRevolution -- Aiomatic - Automatic AI Content Writer & Editor, GPT-3 & GPT-4, ChatGPT ChatBot & AI Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodeRevolution -- Aiomatic - Automatic AI Content Writer & Editor, GPT-3 & GPT-4, ChatGPT ChatBot & AI Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2024-5969|2024-07-27T07:33:46.658Z -- coderevolution -- aiomatic%20-%20automatic%20ai%20content%20writer%20%26%20editor%2C%20gpt-3%20%26%20gpt-4%2C%20chatgpt%20chatbot%20%26%20ai%20toolkit
item.description: The AIomatic - Automatic AI Content Writer for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary email sending vulnerability in versions up to, and including, 2.0.5. This is due to insufficient limitations on the email recipient and the content in the 'aiomatic_send_email' function which are reachable via AJAX. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to send emails with any content to any recipient.
